text: Istana Budaya, also called the Palace of Culture, is Malaysia's main place for theater, music, and opera. It's in Kuala Lumpur, near the National Art Gallery. It was opened in 1999 by Malaysian Prime Minister, Mahathir Mohamad. From September 24 to October 4, 2010, Istana Budaya hosted Mahathir, the Musical. ==References == Category:Buildings and structures in Kuala Lumpur Category:Concert halls Category:Theatres
title: Istana Budaya
